full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Red Hat Container Adoption Boot Camp for Administrators (DO700) Training

## Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number:** 100022427
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-22
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2023-01-12T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Description of Services

The [Employment and Social Development Canada](http://www(hrsc-gc.gc.ca/en) (ESDC) is seeking a supplier to provide Red Hat Container Adoption Boot Camp for Administrators (DO700) training. This training will be delivered as two Microsoft Teams online sessions in English by March 31, 2023. The contract period will begin on award date and end on March 31, 2023.

## Eligible Bidders

Only PSPC CAITTS SA Suppliers are eligible to submit a proposal for this tender. The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Groupe Edgenda inc.
* Collège MultiHexa
* Destech Consulting Services Inc.
* Fifalde Consulting Inc.
* ExitCertified
* Global Knowledge Network Canada Inc.
* Learning Tree International
* Newcomp Analytics
* S.T.C.G. The Standford
* SAS Institute (Canada) Inc.
* Choquette Technology Associates
* StormWind LLC
* Versalys Inc.
* NobleProg
* Technologia

## Procurement Method and Agreement

This tender is being issued under the CAITTS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. All terms and conditions of the CAITTS SA apply and are incorporated into any resulting contract.

## Security Requirement

There are no security requirements applicable to this tender.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the provisions of various trade agreements, including:

* World Trade Organization – Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO – AGP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPaFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive Economic Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for
